8. Puncture the finger with a sterile lancet.
9. Slowly add 1 drop of blood to the sample well and add 2 drops of the assay diluents.
10. As the test begins to work, a purple colour will be seen moving across the result window in the 
centre of the test device.
11. Interpret test* result at 5-20 mins (do not interpret after 20 mins) as per the manufacturerâ€™s 
instructions.
